text.content:
Greatship

This enormous ship has four masts and can carry up to two hundred Medium creatures. Greatships are often used in war to carry soldiers. In addition to the pilot, it requires a crew of twenty to sail effectively. The vessel is 20 squares long and 8 squares wide, and it has a deck that rises 4 squares above the waterline.

Published in Adventurer's Vault, page(s) 20.
